slide.descriptor: Overview of making slides in powerpoint

textbody.textstring: YOU SHOULD HEAR THE COUNT IMMEDIATELY, THEN KALIMBA BEGINNNING WHEN THE COUJNT REACHES 10.
Select picture as the fill type then find an image in resources taking note of the file name.
To change the image right click and select format options then select fill from the tabs. \n\n
Specify the file path by right-clicking the image and edit the text (click edit text) to resources/images/YourImageName.jpg
Draw with as many points as you like then double-click to finish the shape.\n You can edit the shape accurately by right-clicking on it and selecting edit points
To create a Shape you must use the freeform shape tool which can be found in shapes. \n The icon looks like this!
Adjacent text bodies must line up to ensure the correct ordering

The text formatting (size, font and colour) must be set on the bounding box which can be done easily if you select all boxes by dragging and set the formatting\n Bold, Italic and Underline are set seperately for each text body based on the first characters formatting
The Text requires multiple text boxes, a bounding text box which contains no text at all but contains all the text body sections

The text body sections should be text boxes Aligned to the left and top edge of the bounding box or the previous text body.\n The bounding box should if possible have extra space below the text bodies to allow for text enlargment

slide.descriptor: How to add music and video

textbody.textstring: The Video is similar but uses a chart in the title set in the Alt text section of the Format chart area menu. To change this right-click and select format chart area.
The Music is incorporated using a table in which the cell(1,1) is the urlName of the music
